channel.title: SD on Small Fire`s Blog

item.title: SD Function module
item.description: Function Modules RV_ORDER_FLOW_INFORMATION - Reads sales document flow of sales document after delivery and billing Don’t forget also check direct reference documents for the both starting document # and preceding/following document types that you are searching for (For example, if you search delivery for the given SO, check also LIPS-VGBEL and LIPS-VGPOS, if it’s possible with regard to performance). SD_SALES_DOCUMENT_READ - Reads sales document header and business data: tables VBAK,
